review: I would give this 5 stars, but it really doesn't replace the need for cable yet. You need an amazon prime, hulu plus, netflix, and xfinity/cable subscription to get the most out of this. The prime movie selection is pretty weak. I don't have hulu plus (since we already spend a ton on cable). I feel like my options are a bit limited. The games you can play in groups are fun for get-togethers with family (e.g. You Don't Know Jack). But mostly I use this to watch old ocean documentaries from Prime or MST3K on the Pluto TV app as I go to sleep. It has eliminated the need for us to have a cable line hooked up to our bedroom TV, but not the need to have cable altogether because we still need college football in our living room. If Amazon could sell us shark week and all the college football broadcasts we need we'd get rid of Comcast yesterday. C'mon Amazon! You're almost there!!
author: Turanga Leela
